author: kameshj
msg: Fix #2963 'Fix merge range notification which gives a false alarm of
* the merge notification to happen only for an operative merge in case
* the merge notification target would be the nearest item in
the merge revisions shown in the notification is first item from
the 'remaining_ranges' of corresponding item from children_with_mergeinfo.
(merge_fails_if_subtree_is_deleted_on_src): Fix the expected output as per
(notification_receiver): Notify merge notification lines as appropriate.
(do_merge): Do merge begin notification only for 3 way merge only, same url
merge will be taken care by 'notification_receiver'.
Initialize notify_b->cur_ancestor_index to '-1' before each do_merge call.

author: lgo
msg: Fix authz_tests 2 over ra_neon, where writing to /A/B/E needs write access to
This change eliminates ra_neon getting the version resource URL from the
server for those intermediate directories, thereby currently failing
authorization if those directories aren't writeable to the user. The version
resource URL can be calculated from the parent's version resource URL and the
name of the child resource. This also avoids unneeded PROPFIND requests to
(version_rsrc_t): add member variable for the name of the resource.
(get_version_url): take parent resource parameter, use it to calculate the
child version resource URL if we don't have it stored already, or we're
forced to get it from the server.
(add_child): fill in name of the child resource. Update call to
get_version_url to pass the parent resource.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add initial ra-neon implementation of the get-location-segments RA API.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add mod_dav_svn REPORT handler for get-location-segments RA API.
